alert.note: Alert for Esmeralda; Nye (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued April 11 at 2:47PM PDT until April 11 at 3:30PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...A DUST STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 PM PDT FOR NORTHWESTERN NYE AND NORTHEASTERN ESMERALDA COUNTIES... At 243 PM PDT, a dense dust channel was still occuring across Highway 95 between Goldfield and Tonopah. Other, areas of blowing dust could be seen on satellite along Highway 95 and 6 west of Tonopah. HAZARD...Less than one quarter mile with damaging wind in excess of 60 mph. SOURCE...Detected by National Weather Service meteorologists. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. * Highways 95 and 6. Locations impacted include...Silverpeak, Goldfield. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Dust storms lead to dangerous driving conditions with visibility reduced to near zero. If driving, avoid dust storms if possible. If caught in one, then pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.
